forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early, then off and on rain showers for the afternoon. High 11C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early, then off and on rain showers for the afternoon. High 52F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 8C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 46F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds SW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 51F. Winds SW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with light rain early...then becoming mostly clear late. Low 3C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with light rain early...then becoming mostly clear late. Low 38F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Thunder possible. High 8C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Thunder possible. High 47F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Thunder possible. Low 3C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Thunder possible. Low 37F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with scattered thunderstorms. High around 10C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with scattered showers and thunderstorms, mainly in the afternoon. High 49F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Slight chance of a shower throughout the evening. Low 2C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Slight chance of a shower throughout the evening. Low near 35F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 11C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 52F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear. Low 36F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 13C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Plentiful sunshine. High 56F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low around 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low near 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 14C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 58F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 6C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 43F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 13C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 56F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 7C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 44F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 12C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 54F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 6C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 42F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 12C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 54F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 6C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 42F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
